regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall evaluate the job's budget against available resources and include this evaluation in determining whether to accept or reject the job.

regen.absent_element: consideration of budget in job acceptance decision
regen.new_specification: The scheduler shall evaluate the job's budget against the available resources and include this evaluation in the determination of whether to accept or reject the job.
The scheduler shall evaluate whether the job can be completed within the specified budget, considering the resource utilization costs and the execution time of the job.

label: The scheduler shall evaluate the budget for the job.
absence: evaluation of budget for the job
